thread.title: UVa Basketball Ranked #6 in Preseason Top 25
thread.title_full: UVa Basketball Ranked #6 in Preseason Top 25

title: UVa Basketball Ranked #6 in Preseason Top 25
text:
UVa Basketball Ranked #6 in Preseason Top 25 Posted: 
The Virginia men's basketball team is ranked #6 in the USA Today Coaches Preseason Poll. 
That's UVa's highest ranking since debuting at #1 before the 1982 season. 
The Cavaliers begin the season at home against Morgan State on November 13th. 
USA Today Coaches Preseason Top 25 1) Kentucky (11) Sign Up for Email Alerts

Full Story Monday, October 12 2015 9:11 PM EDT 2015-10-13 01:11:51 GMT The UVa pitching staff played a key role in the Cavaliers first-ever national title The Virginia Baseball program will hold the 2016 Step Up to the Plate event and 2015 National Championship Ring Ceremony on Saturday, Jan. 30, 2015, at 6 p.m. at JPJ. The annual fundraiser is one of the highlights of the Virginia Baseball calendar, but takes on a special tone this year as UVA also will present its first NCAA championship team with its national championship rings.
